items.name: Thomas's review of Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (Harry Potter, #1)
items.description: Because everyone on the planet excluding me and maybe some of the Kardashians have read this series, I'll skip the plot summary and go for a less formal review. I can see why so many people adore Harry Potter. While Rowling does not introduce anything particularly groundbreaking in terms of ...

items.name: Elle (ellexamines)'s review of Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone (Harry Potter, #1)
items.description: I have so much to say here, and there's no way I can say all of it. This series truly made me fall even deeper in love with reading. We've all enthused about this first book a lot. I'd like to spare a few words for how this series improves down the line, even from its spectacular beginning.
